LanguageData.VME_Darklight_NormalPreferred.label: normal preferred
LanguageData.VME_Darklight_NormalPreferred.descriptio: Darklight is an unnatural and cheap imitation of the miracle that is light, and should be avoided.
LanguageData.VME_DarknessCombat_Despised.label: despised
LanguageData.VME_DarknessCombat_Despised.description: Beyond being difficult to fight in, bloodshed should never take place in darkness, lest the enemy be spared peering into your eyes before you end their lives.
